profile.title: Xogta Isticmaalaha
profile.mustLogin: Waa inaad gasho si aad u aragto dejimaha.
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Ilbiriqsiyo ka hor inta si toos ah loo tirtiro
profile.avatarError: Khalad ayaa ka dhacay soo gelinta astaanta
profile.noPrivateKey: Furaha gaarka ah lagama helin aaladdan si loo dhoofiyo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Deji eray-sir si aad u sir-geliso kaydkaaga:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kayd siraysan waa la soo dejiyay.
profile.importSuccess: Furaha gaarka ah ayaa lagu keenay aaladdan.
profile.importFailed: Keenistu way fashilantay (eray-sir khaldan ama fayl dhaawacan).
profile.keysRotated: Lammaane fure cusub ayaa la abuuray, furaha guudna waa la geliyay.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Furahaaga gaarka ahi weligii kama baxo aaladdan. Dhoofso nuqul eray-sir leh si aad ugu soo celiso aalad kale.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa Free—ku isticmaal xulashooyinka Qorrax/Dayax ee hoos ku yaal. Kordhi si aad u furto mowduucyo dheeraad ah.
profile.backupDesc: Abuur kayd siraysan oo furayaal ah, kuna soo celi aalad kale si aad u is-waafajiso.
profile.notifyOnCopy: I wargeli haddii fariintayda la koobiyeeyo
profile.followHint: Sheekooyinkoodu waxay ka muuqan doonaan feed-ka Raacayaal haddii ay u daabacaan Dhageystayaal ‘Followers’ (ama Dadweyne).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: U gudbi wicitaannada iyo fariimaha soo galaya telefoonkaaga ama iimaylka la xaqiijiyay. Wicitaannada/fariimaha baxaya waxay muujin karaan lambarkaaga Chatforia.
profile.errE164: Geli telefoon sax ah oo E.164 ah (tusaale +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Dooro ugu yaraan hal meel loo gudbiyo (telefoon ama iimayl).
profile.errQuietHours: Saacadaha aamusnaanta waa inay u dhexeeyaan 0 ilaa 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Dooro qoraal ama qol si aad u bilowdo sheekada
chat.emptySubtitle: Dir fariin si aad u bilowdo sheeko.

status.filesNote: Ilaa 5 fayl. Caadi ahaan wuu dhacaa 24 saacadood gudahood.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Gali si aad u beddesho dejimaha.

premium.heading: Noqo Premium
premium.description: Fur awoodaha dheeraadka ah & ka saar xayaysiisyada.

auth.headline: Farriin ammaan ah oo caalami ah oo turjumis degdeg ah leh
auth.description: Sir-galin dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad, tarjumaad AI-ku caawiyo, fariimo dabar-go’a, iyo wicitaan cod/fiidiyoow.

feature.encryption: Sir-galin dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad ah oo caadi ah

auth.desktopTip: Kombuyuutar ma isticmaashaa? Ku sawir taleefankaaga si aad u hesho app-ka.
auth.subhead: Farriin gaar ah, siraysan, isla markaana la tarjumo — daqiiqad gudaheed.
auth.tip: Chatforia waxaad ka isticmaali kartaa qalab kasta — ama soo dejiso app-ka si aad u hesho waayo-aragnimo fiican.
auth.scanHint: Ku sawir si aad u soo dejiso app-ka ama ugu furto browser-ka.

home.title: Bogga Hore
home.subheader: Dir fariin si aad u bilowdo sheeko.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Qor fariin si aad u dirto

press.title: Warbaahinta
press.contactText: Weydiimaha warbaahinta, nagala soo xiriir press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia waa fariin-wade ammaan ah oo leh tarjumaad degdeg ah iyo E2E sir-galin, loona qaabeeyay in wada sheekaysiga caalamiga ahi uu noqdo gaar iyo fudud.
press.assetsText: Logos, sawirro shaashad, iyo sawirro alaab (way soo socdaan).

careers.title: Shaqooyin
careers.intro: Waxaan nahay koox yar oo dhisaysa fariin-wade gaar ah oo caalami ah. Haddii aad ka welwelsan tahay sir-galinta, helitaanka, iyo UX qurux badan, waan jeclaan lahayn inaan ka maqallo.
careers.openRoles: Jagooyin furan: Injineernimo (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Taageero.
careers.apply: Sida loo codsado: U soo dir resume/isku-xirayaasha jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ku saabsan Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia waa fariin-wade ammaan ah, badan-luqado leh oo leh sir-galin dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad, tarjumaad degdeg ah, iyo wicitaan cod/fiidiyoow. Hadafkayagu waa fudud: dadka ka caawi inay isku xirmaan—si ammaan ah, si gaar ah, kana gudbaya luqadaha.

values.control: Xakamayn: Fariimaha dabar-go’a & caddeynta akhriska waa ikhtiyaari.

about.howDescription: Fariimaha waxaa lagu sir-geliyaa aaladdaada ka hor inta aysan bixin. Tarjumista, kaydka, iyo isku-dubbaridku waxaa loogu talagalay in la yareeyo waxa server-yadu arki karaan.

advertise.title: Ku xayaysii Chatforia
advertise.description: Gaadh isticmaaleyaal ku hawlan farriimaha adoo adeegsanaya meelo muuqaal fiican leh oo sumad-badbaado ah. Waxaan bixinnaa bannaan-xayaysiisyo, kafaala-qaadyo, iyo ololeyaal guri. Kuwo Premium ah xayaysiis ma arkaan.

adsense.withPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsaneynaa Google AdSense. Haddii aad rabto inaad na bartilmaameedsato Google Ads, isticmaal aqoonsiga daabacaha {{pubId}} oo weydii meelayn la maamulo qaybaha hoose. Kafaala-qaad toos ah waa la heli karaa—isticmaal foomka.
adsense.noPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsaneynaa Google AdSense. Kafaala-qaad toos ah sidoo kale waa la heli karaa—isticmaal foomka hoose.

advertise.noPlacements: Meelayn lama qaabeyn wali. Ku dar ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Fadhiyaal badan iyo joognayn dheer oo ku jira UI-ga sheekada
why.brandSafe: Qaabab sumad-badbaado leh; xadeyn soo- muuqasho ixtiraam leh
why.sponsoredMoments: Waayo-aragnimo kafaala-qaad (tusaale, “Bilow Sheeko” modal) ayaa la heli karaa
why.deals: Heshiisyo toos ah ama barnaamij ahaan Google Ads/AdSense

form.submittedMsg: Mahadsanid! Weydiintaadu way soo socotaa. Waan kula soo xiriiri doonaa dhowaan.
form.missingRequired: Fadlan buuxi magac, iimayl, iyo farriin.
form.successToast: Mahadsanid! Waan kula soo xiriiri doonaa dhawaan.
form.mailtoInfo: Waxaan furaynaa macmiilka iimaylkaaga si aad u dirto weydiinta…

upgrade.title: Kordhi
upgrade.subtitle: Fur qorshaha kugu habboon: ka bax xayaysiisyada adigoo Plus ah, ama hel dhammaan awoodaha Premium.

features.ringtones: Ringtone-yo & dhawaaqyo fariin oo gaar ah

features.save25: Keydso ~25% marka la barbar dhigo bille
features.sameFeatures: Astaamo la mid ah kuwa Bille

gettingStarted.title: Bilowga Degdegga ah
gettingStarted.subtitle: Chatforia ma ku cusub tahay? Hagahan degdegga ahi wuxuu ku tusayaa aasaaska si aad daqiiqado gudahood wax-soo-saar u noqoto.

alert.text: Hagahan wuu koraan marka aan soo saarno astaamo cusub. Haddii wax kaa maqan yihiin, nala soo xiriir adiga oo maraya

section2.title: 2) Bilow farriin dirista
section2.item1: Abuur DM ama Koox kadibna dir fariintaadii ugu horreysay.
section2.item2: Isticmaal tarjumaad degdeg ah si aad uga sheekaysato 100+ luqadood.
section2.item3: Tijaabi fariimaha dabar-go’a iyo caddeynta akhriska Profile → Asturnaanta.

section3.title: 3) Soco si qoto dheer
section3.item2Part1: Ku xidh qalabyo dheeraad ah oo deji kayd siraysan gudaha

account.q: Sideen u abuurtaa ama u soo ceshadaa akoon?
account.a: Soo dejiso app-ka ama isticmaal web, ku dhufo “Abuur akoon”, xaqiiji iimayl/telefoon. Si aad u soo ceshato, isticmaal “Eray-sir ma illoowday”.

privacy.q: Fariimaha ma waxa lagu sir-geliyaa dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad?
privacy.a: Haa. Fariimaha iyo wicitaannada waxaa lagu sir-geliyaa dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad si caadi ah. Adiga iyo qofka aad wada sheekaysanaysaan oo keliya ayaa akhriyi kara.

translate.q: Sidee ayay u shaqeysaa tarjumaadda degdegga ah?
translate.a: Daar “Tarjum otomaatig” Dejimo → Muuqaal & Luuqad. Waxaan ku tarjumnaa gudaha aaladda marka la taageero, haddii kale APIs ammaan ah oo xog-yar ah ayaan adeegsannaa.

contact.a: Nagala soo xiriir support@chatforia.com. Ku dar sawirro shaashad iyo nooca app-kaaga.

contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.successMsg: Mahadsanid—kooxdayadu email bay kuugu soo jawaabi doonaan.
contact.errorSend: Lama diri karin. Fadlan iimayl u dir support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Qaanuunkan Asturnaantu wuxuu sharxayaa sida Chatforia (“annaga”, “aneynu”) u ururino, u isticmaalno, uguna wadaagno xogta marka aad adeegsaneyso app-yadeenna iyo adeeggeena. Waxaan u naqshadeynay Chatforia in la yareeyo xogta aan arki karno.

infoWeCollect.title: Xogta aan ururinno
infoWeCollect.account: Xogta akoonka (tusaale, iimayl/telefoon) si loo abuuro loona sugo akoonkaaga.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Nuxurka la siray (fariimo/wicitaanno) waa dhammaad-ilaa-dhammaad; annagu ma akhrisan karno.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Khalad-qabasho/isticmaal sida warbixinno jab, nooca qalabka, ama falanqayn kooban si wax loo hagaajiyo.

howWeUse.title: Sida aan xogta u isticmaalno
howWeUse.provide: Si aan u bixinno uguna sugno adeegga (aqoonsi, ogaanshaha spam/ku xadgudub).
howWeUse.improve: Si aan u hagaajino astaamaha (tayada tarjumaadda, isku-halaynta).
howWeUse.legal: Si aan u hogaansanno waajibaadka sharciga.

sharing.title: Wadaagis
sharing.body: Ma iibinno xogta shakhsiga. Waxaa suuragal ah inaan la wadaagno xog xaddidan adeeg-fuliye (tusaale, riix-ogaansin, falanqayn) iyadoo heshiisyo adag jira.

rights.title: Xuquuqdaada
rights.body: Iyadoo ku xiran gobolkaaga (tusaale, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), waxaad codsan kartaa helitaan, sixid, tirtirid, ama ka-bax habayn qaarkeed. La xiriir: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kaydinta xogta & amniga
retention.body: Waxaan kaydinnaa kaliya waxa loo baahan yahay in adeeggu shaqeeyo, waxaana adeegsannaa amni heer-warshadeed. Nuxurka E2E lama furi karo annaga.

children.title: Carruur
children.body: Chatforia looguma talagelin carruur ka yar 13 (ama sida sharciga deegaankaagu qabo).

changes.title: Isbeddello
changes.body: Waxaan halkan ku daabici doonnaa cusbooneysiinta oo waxaan beddeli doonnaa taariikhda “Ugu dambeysay”.

intro.body: Adiga oo adeegsanaya Chatforia waad ogolaatay Shuruudahan. Haddii aadan ogolayn, ha adeegsan adeegga.

accounts.title: Akoonno
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Bixi xog sax ah oo ilaali xogta gelitaanka.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Adigaa mas’uul ka ah wax kasta oo ku dhaca akoonkaaga.

acceptableUse.title: Isticmaal la aqbali karo
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ha gelin wax sharci-darro, xadgudub, ama ku xadgudba xuquuqda; ha samayn spam ama qalab-otomaatig xadgudub ah.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Waxaan joojin/baajin karnaa haddii la jabiyo.

yourContent.title: Nuxurkaaga
yourContent.body: Xuquuqda nuxurkaaga adigaa leh. Waxaad na siisaa xuquuqda lagama maarmaanka u ah in adeeggu shaqeeyo (tusaale, gudbin, kaydin, tarjumaad).

disclaimer.title: Bayaanno & mas’uuliyad
disclaimer.body: Adeeggu waxa la bixiyaa “sida uu yahay” iyada oo aan dammaanad lahayn. Ilaa inta sharcigu ogol yahay, Chatforia mas’uul kama aha waxyeellooyin aan toos ahayn ama daba-dheer.

changes.title: Isbeddello
changes.body: Waxaan cusbooneysiin karnaa shuruudahan; sii isticmaalka adeegga kadib isbeddelku wuxuu ka dhigan yahay aqbalid.

doNotSell.title: Ha Iibin ama Ha La Wadaagin Xogtayda Shakhsiyeed
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ma iibiso xog shakhsiyeed. Muwaadiniinta California haddana waxay gudbin karaan codsiyo hoosta CPRA iyagoo isticmaalaya badhanka hoose.

cookies.title: Dejinta Kukiyada
cookies.body: Chatforia waxa ay isticmaashaa kukiyooyin kooban (tusaale, fadhi, amni). Ma isticmaalno kukiyooyinka xayaysiisyada dhinac saddexaad. Maamul kukiyada adoo adeegsanaya dejinta browser-kaaga.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Lama rari karo xaaladda lambarka telefoonka.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Lambar lama qoondeyn. Ka dooro koodh aag si aad u bilowdo qoraal diris.

startChatModal.title: Bilow sheeko
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Qor magac, isticmaale, telefoon, ama iimayl…
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Ka raadi magaca isticmaale ama telefoon
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Qor magaca isticmaale ama telefoon kadibna riix Raadi.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Telefoon/iimayl waxaad heli doontaa marka aad kaydiso xiriirrada.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Ku bilaabidda sheeko kuwa la xushay way fashilantay.

sounds.freeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa Free — dhawaaqyada premium waa la tusayaa laakiin waa qufulan. Kordhi si aad u furto dhammaan.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Astaantan waxay u baahan tahay qorshaha Premium.

aiSettings.title: Dejinta AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Xakamee tarjumaadda, jawaabaha caqliga leh, iyo jawaab-celinta otomaatigga ah ee ForiaBot.
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Muuji qoraalka asalka ah agtiisa tarjumaadda
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: U dir AI-ga dhowr fariimood oo aad dhawaan heshay (nadiifin) si uu u soo jeediyo jawaabo degdeg ah.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Muunadee erayo aflagaaddo ah ee talooyinka AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Haddii la daaro, talooyinka AI ee soo noqda waxay yeelan doonaan erayada la calaamadeeyay oo la muuneeyay
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Daar jawaab-otomaatig marka aan mashquul ahay
aiSettings.saveFailed: Ku kaydinta dejimaha AI way fashilantay

accessibilitySettings.title: Helitaan & Digniino
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Doorashooyin ka dhigaya Chatforia mid fudud in la adeegsado adigoon ku tiirsanayn dhawaaq.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Waxay ka bilaabataa cabbir caadi. Kordhi haddii aad jeceshahay qoraal weyn.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Digniino muuqaal ah farriimo & wicitaanno
Muuji banners iyo iljicinta cinwaanka si aadan wax u seegin.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Waji-gariir marka fariin cusub timaado (haddii la taageero)
Kici gariirka aaladda marka ogeysiis yimaado.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Shaashad iftiin u yeel wicitaan soo galaya
Iftiin kooban marka wicitaan soo dhaco.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
U rog qoraal fariimaha codka
Ku lifaaq qoraal fariimaha audio-ga aad hesho.
accessibilitySettings.changesSavedInstantly: Isbeddelada si degdeg ah ayaa loo kaydiyaa.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Muuji banners iyo iljicinta cinwaanka si aadan wax u seegin.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Waji-gariir marka fariin cusub timaado (haddii la taageero)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Kici gariirka aaladda marka ogeysiis yimaado.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Shaashad iftiin u yeel marka wicitaan soo galo
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Iftiin kooban marka wicitaan soo dhaco.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Ku kaydi server-ka keliya qoraalka la siray. Waxay naaftaa AI/Tarjumaad iyo hor-eegga kormeerka.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Ka raadi naanays, magac, isticmaale, ama telefoon
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Dhawr dariiqo oo degdeg ah si aad u bilaabato.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: La wadaag xiriirkaaga martiqaadka si aad si degdeg ah u wada sheekaysataan.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: La soco socdaalka adigoo adeegsanaya Chatforia ee iOS iyo Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Talo: Fariimahaaga waxay isku-waafaqnaanayaan web iyo mobile.

randomChat.title: Sheeko Random
randomChat.description: La kulmo qof cusub isla markiiba. Waxaan kugu xidhaynaa qof kadibna waxaan fureynaa qol sheeko ku-meelgaar ah.
randomChat.saveGuard: Keliya sheekooyinka bini-aadam-bini-aadam ayaa la kaydin karaa
